attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In view of the following incitement to religious hatred, and in all fairness, surely a balanced view should be sought."We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Bring Back the anti-witchcraft laws of this country. More details

Submitted by William W Ness – Deadline to sign up by: 13 September 2008"
If this is permitted, seeking to ban Paganism, conversely are we able to seek to ban other religious groups?

rejection.details: Witchcraft is not a recognised religion.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
